content: आनत {%<ab>p. p.</ab>%} {@--1@} Respectfully saluted or bowed to. {@--2@} (Actively used) Bent down, bending, stooping, inclined; कुसुमानताः (तरवः) <ls>Ki. 5. 25</ls>; <ls>Rs. 6. 3</ls>; पादानतः <ls>Ku. 3. 8</ls>; so प्रश्रय°, फलभार°. {@--3@} Making a low bow, saluting respectfully; <ls>R. 1. 92</ls>, <ls n="R.">4. 69.</ls> {@--4@} Humble, obedient, submissive, pacified, conciliated.
